::Aerotaur::
    "Windlord.  Take care of Nightlight for the moment.  I will make him pay 
for what he did to her!"  He turns to glare at Clash.  "You know nothing of 
honor.  As for me I was honorable by protecting Nightlight.  Now, are you 
ready to die?"
